mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commission of the peace for county of Alexandria is: George Gilpin, Wm. Fitzhugh, Francis Peyton, Richard Conway, Elisha Cullyn Dick, Cha. Alexander, George Taylor, Jonah Thomson, Abraham Fane, John Herbert, Alexander Smith, Cuthbert Powell, Peter Wise, Jr., Jacob Houghman & Thomas Dame; as commissions expire with present session of Congress has sent their names to Senate for permanent appointment.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Dick, Elisha Cullen, 1762-1825
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1802 March 31, Washington [D.C.] to Francis Peyton, n.p.
